import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MapComponent=_ref=>{let{mapLoaded,restaurants,mapCenter}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{if(mapLoaded&&window.kakao){const container=document.getElementById('map');const options={center:new window.kakao.maps.LatLng(mapCenter.lat,mapCenter.lng),level:3};const map=new window.kakao.maps.Map(container,options);// 레스토랑 위치에 마커 추가
